About Events

British Biology Competition

An annual opportunity for students to test their skills in Biology, UCC is hosting its first BBO competition this year virtually.

Wizprodigy Robotics

The Wizprodigy comeptition allows students to design their own robotics trucks and compete in competitions, with prizes and scholarships worth up to $2000.
